entry.title: [BHS/GRA][Data & Analytics] - Logs Data Platform maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 17, 12:00 - 16:00 UTC

Jul 15, 20:38 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our Logs Data Platform offering.

Start time : 17/09/2025 12:00 UTC
End time : 17/09/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : The public API of Logs Data Platform product will be on read only mode during the whole maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on Logs Data Platform offering.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA][Containers & Orchestration] - Managed Private Registry maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 19, 08:00 - 19:00 UTC

Jun 4, 20:30 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed Private Registry offer.

This may temporarily affect Functionality.

Start time : 19/08/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 19/08/2025 19:00 UTC
Service impact : Managed Private Registries will be set in read-only mode (only pull will be allowed) for less than 30 minutes.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will migrate some registries being on GRA region to a new infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [MUM/SYD2][Compute - Instance] - API maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 12, 13:00 UTC  -  Aug 20, 15:00 UTC

Jul 15, 20:54 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Compute - Instance offer.

This may temporarily affect latency.

Start time : 12/08/2025 13:00 UTC
End time : 20/08/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact : During that maintenance, our Compute API may be slower.
Customers can also face few 500 errors from API.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our public cloud compute API.
You can find more information about the maintenance dates below:

-AP-SOUTH-MUM-VPS-1 12/08/2025 13:00 UTC (duration 2 hours)
-AP-SOUTHEAST-SYD-2 13/08/2025 13:00 UTC (duration 2 hours)
-AP-SOUTH-MUM-1 20/08/2025 13:00 UTC (duration 2 hours)

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX/SBG][Containers & Orchestration] - Managed Rancher Service upgrade notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 5, 08:00 - 16:00 UTC

Jun 12, 16:32 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Containers & Orchestration offer.

Start time : 05/08/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 05/08/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : Rancher version 2.8.7 end of support is reached since April 2025.
As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need to force upgrade Ranchers to version 2.9.
The Rancher compatibility matrix with downstream clusters will be changed, as K8S version 1.25 & 1.26 will no longer be officially supported.
For more information regarding Managed Rancher Service supported versions and lifecycle policy, you can visit this page: KB0064608

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [SGP1][Network] - Network maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 29, 09:00 - 11:00 UTC

Jul 10, 17:49 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our network infrastructure in the public cloud region SGP1.

Start time : 29/07/2025 09:00 UTC
End time : 29/07/2025 11:00 UTC
Service impact : The network of all public cloud compute, loadbalancer and routers located in the region SGP1 will observe up to 2 seconds of packet loss. The packet loss will happen once per service during the maintenance window.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our network infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA1][Compute - Instance] - Instances incident notification
entry.content:
Jul 20, 02:23 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Compute - Instance offering in the region GRA1 has been resolved.

Start time : 19/07/2025 22:24 UTC
End time : 20/07/2025 02:20 UTC
Root Cause : A service disruption occurred due to an unexpected infrastructure malfunction.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jul 19, 21:22 UTC
Investigating - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Compute - Instance offering in the region GRA1.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 19/07/2025 21:15 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some instances in the region GRA1 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access and use their instances.
Root Cause : A service disruption occurred due to an unexpected infrastructure malfunction.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Existing resources are not affected and there is no impact on workloads.
